text: Joshua Michael Homme ( ;Listen , taken from an interview with KBZT radio station, May 19, 2005 born May 17, 1973) is an American musician, singer- songwriter, and record producer. He is best known as the founder, primary songwriter, and only continuous member of the rock band Queens of the Stone Age. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock drummers Category:American pianists Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from California Category:Singers from California Category:Writers from California Category:Eagles of Death Metal Category:People from Palm Desert, California
title: Josh Homme
